snippet.title: The Banner Saga Trilogy | Epic Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
THE END HAS COME!

Watch the Epic launch trailer for Banner Saga Trilogy, the award winning strategy RPG series from indie developer Stoic.

Now you can play the complete Banner Saga trilogy from beginning to climactic end on Epic! What tough choices will you make as you navigate this breaking world. Who will you trust along the way and how will your journey end?
